entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
